landing-page.title: Learn programming by developing games!
landing-page.description: Create your own games with a programming language adapted to your knowledge. Even if it's your first time coding, you can easily build a fun and fully functional game!

difficulty.title: Choose your level!
difficulty.lvl1-descr: First time on this app? Never coded or programmed a game before? This is the right place to begin!
difficulty.lvl2-descr: You have basic knowledge in programmation and you already programmed few games with this app? Don't wait, try this level!
difficulty.lvl3-descr: You already know how to code and game development has no secret for you anymore? You want to enjoy yourself with more freedom in your code? Go for it!

board-init.bgndFixedDescr: The background fits the dimensions of the game. This is the default background type and is suitable for many games.
board-init.bgndCameraDescr: Only a portion the game is visible at any time. This portion is defined by the camera dimensions. If a hero-type sprite is defined, it is automatically followed by the camera.
board-init.bgndScrollDescr: The background is repeated in any direction and can be scrolled. This gives an impression of infinity.
board-init.errorHeader: There are errors in sprite names
board-init.errorLow: Sprite name should start with lower case letter
board-init.errorSpec: Sprite name shouldn't contain special character
board-init.noProperties: No specific properties for this sprite type.
board-init.noMethods: No specific methods for this sprite type.
board-init.noEvents: No specific events for this sprite type.
board-init.propertiesClickInfoEN: Click for more info on properties
board-init.methodsClickInfoEN: Click for more info on methods
board-init.eventsClickInfoEN: Click for more info on events
board-init.propertiesClickInfoFR: Clique pour plus d'info sur les propriétés
board-init.methodsClickInfoFR: Clique pour plus d'info sur les méthodes
board-init.eventsClickInfoFR: Clique pour plus d'info sur les événements
board-init.methodsInfo:
A sprite method is an action that the sprite can execute such as jump, fire,...
It can be executed as follow: mySpriteName.myMethodName()
The parentheses are mandatory and the method can take parameters within those parentheses.
Example: myHero.equipWeapon(myWeapon);
A parameter as a type that has to be respected.
A method can also return a value that can be assigned to a variable.
board-init.eventsInfo:
A sprite event is a boolean value that is automatically set when a specific event happens to this sprite such as a collision.
It cannot be manually set.
It can be usefully used in an event condition.
Example:
when myHero.isHit
do {
myHero.die()
}
